org.greatage.ioc.resource
Interface Resource

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResource, ClasspathResource
public interface Resource

This interface represents application hierarchical localized resource that can be represented as input stream.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

Method Summary
 boolean exists()
          Checks if this resource exists.
 Resource getChild(String path)
          Gets a child resource of this resource by specified relative path.
 Locale getLocale()
          Gets resource locale for localized resources.
 String getName()
          Gets resource name.
 Resource getParent()
          Gets parent resource.
 Resource inLocale(Locale locale)
          Gets the same resource in specified locale.
 InputStream open()
          Opens resource as an input stream.
 

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Gets resource name.

Returns:
resource name

getParent

Resource getParent()
Gets parent resource.

Returns:
instance of parent resource or null if it is in the root

getLocale

Locale getLocale()
Gets resource locale for localized resources.

Returns:
resource locale or null for non localized resources

exists

boolean exists()
Checks if this resource exists.

Returns:
true if resource exists, false otherwise

getChild

Resource getChild(String path)
Gets a child resource of this resource by specified relative path.

Parameters:
path - relative path to child resource
Returns:
child resource instance, not null

inLocale

Resource inLocale(Locale locale)
Gets the same resource in specified locale.

Parameters:
locale - resource locale
Returns:
the same resource in specified locale or null if not exists

open

InputStream open()
                 throws IOException
Opens resource as an input stream.

Returns:
resource input stream representation or null if not exists
Throws:
IOException - if error occurs during resource opening
